entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:37 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
